meanings.sent1: The foxier fox outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She thought the plan was foxier than anything she had come up with before.
meanings.sent3: The foxier fox pretended to be asleep to catch the sneaky rabbit.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as foxier than a well-planned scheme.
meanings.sent5: The foxier tactics of the detective helped solve the mystery quickly.

meanings.definition: (comparative of 'foxy') More attractive or appealing in a sexy way.
meanings.sent1: The new dress she wore made her look even foxier than usual.
meanings.sent2: He tried to act foxier to impress his date at the party.
meanings.sent3: The foxier outfit she chose turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were as foxier as a mesmerizing spell.
meanings.sent5: The actor's charm made him the foxier choice for the leading role.
